about_the_game:
"

Fey Encounters


By: 
Scoundrel Game Labs



Fey Encounters

 is a collection of 60 random encounters set in the Fey Realm for fifth edition fantasy. These encounters are designed to capture the whimsical yet dangerous atmosphere the Fey are known for. This is an ideal companion for a campaign based in 
the Fey Realm. 


This supplement provides 60 random encounters designed to capture the whimsy and wildness of the Fey Realm. These encounters include a mix of combat, exploration, and social encounters. Unusual creatures and elemental magic combine to provide you with an array of dangers and delights for your party. The module includes:

  • 60 unique Fey encounters  encompassing every pillar of fifth edition fantasy: exploration, combat, and social interaction.

  • Scalable encounters  with guidance on using every encounter in any tier of play.
  • Module full of content including new monsters, custom magical items, and beautiful art. 
  • New monsters, magical items, and more. 
"

Fey Encounters

Fey Encounters

 is a collection of 60 random encounters set in the Fey Realm for fifth edition fantasy. These encounters are designed to capture the whimsical yet dangerous atmosphere the Fey are known for. This is an ideal companion for a campaign based in 
the Fey Realm. 


This supplement provides 60 random encounters designed to capture the whimsy and wildness of the Fey Realm. These encounters include a mix of combat, exploration, and social encounters. Unusual creatures and elemental magic combine to provide you with an array of dangers and delights for your party. The module includes:

  • 60 unique Fey encounters  encompassing every pillar of fifth edition fantasy: exploration, combat, and social interaction.

  • Scalable encounters  with guidance on using every encounter in any tier of play.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

name: Fantasy Grounds - Fey Encounters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
